models.name: mira-OSS
models.description: This is the public release of MIRA OS. Discrete memories decay through momentum loss, tools auto-configure when dropped into tools/ folder, and the system prompt composes from modular trinkets. I would like to think I've made an elegant brain-in-box. You load it and send cURL requests - it talks back, learns, and uses tools. Contributions welcome.

models.description: Official release of "Spatial-SSRL: Enhancing Spatial Understanding via Self-Supervised Reinforcement Learning"

models.description: Official release of code for the paper RL is a hammer and LLMs are nails A simple RL approach to stronger prompt injection attacks

models.name: prompt-siren

models.name: mcp-github-pr-issue-analyser
models.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) application for automated GitHub PR analysis and issue management. Enables LLMs to fetch PR details, analyse diffs, manage issues, and handle releases through a standardised interface

models.description: Convert SEC EDGAR filings, exhibits, and press releases to clean, LLM-ready Markdown. Page-aware. Section-aware. Table-preserving. Built for retrieval and reasoning.

models.name: synapz
models.description: synapz is a research prototype exploring how large language models can adapt teaching content to different cognitive styles. built over a 48-hour sprint with a strict $50 api budget, this project implements a scientific framework to test whether adaptive teaching produces measurably better results than static approaches.

models.description: üìÑ Generate and fine-tune large language models on Apple silicon effortlessly with MLX LM, integrating seamlessly with the Hugging Face Hub.

models.description: üåä Stabilize long-form text generation with RD-Net's simple drift mechanism for frozen large language models, reducing repetition collapse effectively.

models.name: agentdeck-preview
models.description: AgentDeck is a research platform for studying AI behavior through game scenarios. Run controlled experiments with LLMs, collect comprehensive behavioral data, and replay matches for analysis. üöß Preview release - feedback welcome.

models.name: AI-Prompt-Failure-Diagnosis-Agent
models.description: An intelligent Agentic AI system that analyzes, diagnoses, and improves ineffective prompts used with Large Language Models (LLMs). Instead of merely generating new responses, this agent focuses on understanding why a prompt failed and how to fix it ‚Äî acting as an AI debugging assistant for prompt engineering.

models.name: Continuous-Fine-Tuning-Pipeline-for-LLMs-Airflow-HuggingFace-LoRA-
models.description: A production-grade Self-Improving AI System that continuously fine-tunes a Large Language Model (DeepSeek Coder) on new domain-specific data, evaluates its quality, and automatically deploys it for high-performance inference.

models.name: self_learning_content_moderation
models.description: This project implements an industry-grade toxic / abusive content detection pipeline that goes beyond static machine learning models. The system automatically detects novel (out-of-distribution) language, discovers new open-source datasets, and re-trains itself without human intervention.

models.name: PerLTQA
models.description: PerLTQA is a new benchmark for memory classification, retrieval, and synthesis of Large Language Models

models.description: üñ•Ô∏è Execute Python commands with AIPy, unlocking the potential of large language models to solve complex problems seamlessly.

models.name: Lumina-DiMOO
models.description: üåü Generate and understand multimodal content seamlessly with Lumina-DiMOO, an advanced large language model designed for innovative applications.

models.name: Source-Code-Security-Audit-Reviewer
models.description: intelligent auditing tool powered by large language models, supporting GPT, . It automatically detects security vulnerabilities, performance issues

models.name: AI-Driven-Content-Creator
models.description: The "AI-Driven Personalized Content Creation" project aims to develop a robust platform that leverages advanced models and large language models (LLMs) to generate high-quality, tailored content based on user commands. System will produce polished, contextually appropriate content.

models.name: memfuse
models.description: MemFuse offers a robust memory layer for large language models, enhancing their performance and efficiency. Join our community on GitHub to explore features, report issues, or request new functionalities! üêôüíª

models.description: üïµÔ∏è‚ôÇÔ∏è Analyze and reverse engineer keyword filtering in large language models to enhance compliance and operational insights.

models.description: ‚öîÔ∏è Build, break, and secure Large Language Models with our automated OWASP Top 10 cyber range for hands-on AI security training and research.

models.description: üîß Fine-tune large language models locally on your data, export to GGUF, and train on CPU with ease using the Mobius LLM Fine-Tuning Engine.

models.name: corellm
models.description: üåü Integrate local large language models easily with corellm, featuring a simple API and instant web GUI with Gradio for chat and prompt interactions.

models.description: üöÄ Integrate ARIMA and Large Language Models for accurate forecasting with LLM-Forecast, a streamlined hybrid methodology for data-driven insights.

models.name: HelixCommit
models.description: HelixCommit turns Git history into polished, publish-ready release notes. It understands Conventional Commits, enriches entries with GitHub pull requests, and can summarize changes with OpenAI-compatible LLMs.

models.name: ai-agent-release-readiness-qa
models.description: Deterministic release readiness assessment for AI agent and LLM-based systems using existing test runs and behavioral signals.

models.name: ReleaseNotesRec-Agent
models.description: An AI-powered Release Notes & Feedback Analysis Agent built using LangChain, ChromaDB, and LLMs. It collects release notes, Reddit feedback, and real-world user issues, performs sentiment/topic analysis, and delivers accurate insights through a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) workflow.

models.name: cross-lingual-fake-news-detection
models.description: Analyzing how classical fake news detection models degrade across languages and why multilingual transformers are necessary.

models.name: Training-and-evaluating-cognitive-language-models
models.description: For training a cognitive language model with new datasets.

models.name: Fake-News-Detection
models.description: Developed a text classification model to identify misinformation in news articles.  Implemented TF-IDF Vectorizer to transform unstructured text data into numerical features. Demonstrated proficiency in Data Cleaning and Natural Language Processing.

models.name: ABM_TFG_FAUUFRJ
models.description: This essay investigates the insertion of Agent-Based Modelling (ABM) simulation in architectural/landscape design for public spaces, using the logic of desire paths to generate new layouts and alternatives. The work was based on algorithms such as BOIDs and ant foraging and, using the Python programming language in Rhinoceros 3D/Grasshopper.

models.name: fake_news_detection_nlp
models.description: Built an intelligent system to detect fake or misleading news articles using natural language processing and machine learning. The model analyzes the text of news headlines and articles to classify them as real or fake, helping combat misinformation online.

models.name: Space-Transformers-2026
models.description: This code takes the example given in the paper "SpaceTransformers: Language Modeling for Space Systems"  https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/stamp/stamp.jsp?arnumber=9548078  and starts with the source code and domain-specific models are available at github.com/strath-ace/smart-nlp and adds the ability to evaluative models and provides new features.

models.name: NewSpace
models.description: Social interaction between humans and agentic language models

models.name: newsletter_financeira
models.description: Este projeto √© um agente aut√¥nomo que cria e envia uma newsletter financeira di√°ria por e-mail. O agente utiliza um Large Language Model (LLM) para gerar um boletim informativo detalhado, formatado e perspicaz com base nos movimentos do mercado nas √∫ltimas 24 horas.

models.name: newscope
models.description: This is a Python-based news exploration and summarization application built using Streamlit. It fetches news articles from external APIs, converts them into embeddings, stores them in a vector database, and uses a large language model for retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) based summarization and querying.

models.name: News-Driven-Risk-Analytics-Dashboard
models.description: A real-time financial news analytics system that combines Natural Language Processing (NLP) and data visualization to assess how media sentiment impacts market risk. The project automates an end-to-end data pipeline  mirroring workflows used in risk management and traded-risk model monitoring

models.name: NakliNewsAI-
models.description: NakliNewsAI is a full-stack web application that leverages machine learning and natural language processing to detect fake news articles in real-time. The system analyzes article content, extracts linguistic patterns, and classifies text as either credible or potentially misleading using trained classification models.

models.name: fake_news_detector
models.description: Fake News Detection using Machine Learning is a system that analyzes news text using Natural Language Processing and machine learning techniques to classify it as Fake or Real. The model uses TF-IDF vectorization and Logistic Regression, with a user-friendly Streamlit interface for real-time prediction and confidence display.
